cve_desc: ImageMagick 7.1.0-27 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow.
ImageMagick 7.1.0-27 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow.

commit_message:
patch 9.0.0240: crash when using ":mkspell" with an empty .dic file

Problem:    Crash when using ":mkspell" with an empty .dic file.
Solution:   Check for an empty word tree.
cve_desc: NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0240.
